directions.text: Chop meats and vegetables into tiny bits, set aside.
Heat oil over medium heat in a medium pot and slowly add flour for 15 mins.
Put broth in pot, boil then kill heat and cover to keep warm.
In a Dutch oven over medium high heat cook vegetables for 3 mins, sausages for 5 mins and then chicken for 5 mins.
Combine all ingredients to Dutch oven and cook for 3 mins.
